comment.body: I can get you that set ðŸ˜‰if you want... I'll just have to dig through three 1TB drives lol... but I have to do something else first, so just let me know if you want and I'll hook you up when I get back (maybe 45 minutes).
It took less time, I'm back. Just let me know if you want the set.
Ah, alright. Carry on then, and welcome to ZeroMe.

@Oscarthegrouch: Right.
And why are we still using English? lol... we're both Dutch. We kunnen gewoon NL gebruiken. At least on our own zites.
